title: Bug 14197: Removing a working set immediately applies changes
description: When a working set is removed, changes are immediately applied without confirmation.
OB: Observed Behavior: After creating a working set with one project and selecting it, the package view is filtered.
EB: Expected Behavior: After removing a working set, the changes should not be immediately applied. Instead, a confirmation prompt should be displayed to confirm the removal of the working set.
SR:
Steps to Reproduce: 
1. Create a working set with one project.
2. Select the working set in the package view.
3. Remove the working set.
4. Verify that the changes are immediately applied without any confirmation prompt.
